abusinessl: Electricite de France SA, located in Paris, France, is an integrated energy supplier operating in wide range of electricity-related businesses: generation, transmission, distribution, sale and trading of energy. It operates in South and North Americas, Europe, Africa and Asia. The Company was founded in 1946. founded in 1946.
tbusinessl: Bboxx Capital Togo SA is a manufacturer and distributors of solar energy systems. The Company is located in Lome, Togo.

abusinessl: Sunu Investment Holding is a provider of financial investment services. The Company was founded in June 2017 and is located in Ivory Coast.
tbusinessl: People's Bank for Savings and Credit is a commercial bank. The Company is located in Lome, Togo.
